Very Nice quality, style, and construction.  Traded out my old trifold "costanza" wallet that was a little over 2" thick (trust me, I measured) for this one on the recommendation of my chiropractor.  Now I fit everything I use on a day to day basis in less than 1/2" and I still have junk in there I really don't need.  These wallets are so nice and inexpensive that I purchased a second Le'aokuu Wallet in the larger size to hold all the other junk that was in my old wallet so it could stay in my truck on the odd chance that I would need it.  I definitely recommend these wallets.
